QuestData.Title: Heavy Metal
QuestData.Description: You have a strong feeling that this stone is somehow responsible for the region's refusal to accept the encroaching regrowth.$b$bLooking off to the west, you notice a trail of smoldering debris that appears to be related to this mystery.$b$bYou surmise that clearing the debris might assist Thunk's efforts here.$b$bAnd who knows what this stuff might be good for?
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to collect 7 pieces of Element 116 and bring them to Bizby at Bizby's Caravan.
QuestData.RewardText: What's this?$b$b<Bizby examines the ore.>$b$bWahoo! I know someone who will be most interested in acquiring these samples.$b$bMost generous in payment for them as well, I'll wager.$b$bHere, $c. Take this as your finder's fee.
